quotes.text: In this world where you can be anything, be kind.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshineâ€”and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: You can sleep when you are dead
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The magic you are looking for is the work you are avoiding
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every reel today brings a new vibe tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Small, consistent progress beats rare, perfect effort.
quotes.author: Unknown
